message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $20,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point, and I'm open to discussing further if you have any questions.
Hi Alice, $20,000 is a bit too high for me.  I'm interested in the product, but I'm only willing to pay $15,000. This is my maximum budget, and I'm hoping we can find a way to make this work.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your budget constraints. While $15,000 is below my initial asking price, I'm willing to meet you halfway. Would you consider $17,500?
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $17,500 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go to $16,000.  This is a fair compromise, and I hope we can finalize a deal at this price.
